job_description:
Company: WebFront
Position: Frontend Software Engineer
Location: San Francisco, CA (Hybrid)
Salary: $120,000 - $150,000

About Us:
WebFront is a leading provider of user-friendly web applications and progressive web apps. We focus on creating the best user experiences through innovation and exceptional UI design. We value creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Frontend Software Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining the user interface of our web applications. The ideal candidate will have excellent JavaScript skills and experience with modern frameworks like React.

Responsibilities:
- Develop new user-facing features using React.js
- Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use
- Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code
- Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-browsers and devices

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 3+ years of experience in frontend development
- Proficient in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
- Experience with React.js and Redux

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Typescript
- Familiarity with responsive design principles
- Experience with unit and integration testing

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies
- Collaborative and supportive work environment
